remarks: If the function ` F ` is strictly positive on a set of positive measure, then the integral of the function is positive.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2014.)

itg2gt0.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> 0 < ( F ` x ) ) $.
